name: Space Bang
description:
Oh noes! The Evil Overlord has stolen your Energy Beams and is about to rule the galaxy! Only you can help, become the hero now!

Fly through gorgeous galaxies, space stations and nebulas in this action-packed space shoot 'em up. Gear up for all sorts of asteroids, obstacles and enemies and travel at the Speed of Light!

FEATURES:
:: 10 beautiful and rich Galaxies!
:: Plenty of Guns and Gear to upgrade!
:: Lots of different obstacles and enemies!
:: iCloud Backup - sync between devices!
:: Story like no other!
:: Leaderboards and Achievements!

For more info:
http://www.facebook.com/parttimemonkey
